column5: Monique and I decided to spend one last weekend at camp... got a babysitter for the kids and off we went...  got up here to about three inches of snow which makes 4 wheeling a little toughr hills are slick...  It went to -15 last nite.... it was cool in the tent, but so long as someone got up ever couple of hours and put wood in the fire we were fine... (note to self... insall oil stove...)  when we got here... there was little ice on the river... this morning it was just about froze accross.  heres some pics...   I'm gonna whip her ass at crib.. then backgammon.. then were gonna watch some movies...     The view at 5 oclock..      We brought up a cheap microwave and hot plate so we could keep all the cooking inside..    Getting waters a bit of a challange..
Looks a tad on the chilly side to me.
....Looks like heaven to me! The winter adds a whole new beauty to the north country.
That's just plain geeky  I thought the whole idea was to get away from the technology   Sure looks good though  Maureen

WOW...Looks warm and cozy inside,  and Brrrrrrrrr....on the outside !!!!!!!   Its sure great to get away from it all for a few days isnt TJ ???...well it wont be long till the river is froze over and you will be able to get your hut out there !!!!!, great pics tj,thanks for sharing,man it looks so scenic up there ....cheers
You're gonna whip her ass and then ? Is there going to be a video feed?
Ditto.....

Yer out of yer ever lovin minds bossman!Wouldn't an igloo work better than a tent?guess yer GFI would trip a bit more on the microwave in an igloo but who knows?Really,looks like a good time,cept the part about you being there. Joe
Joe... lol.. if you were here you'd NEVER leave!!
Dont you know it brother! Joe
Looks like a peacefull get-a-way.
Great pics TJ!  Good to see you and Monique got away from it all for a nice weekend.  Oh yeah...time to trim those nose hairs....LOL. (and no, not on Monique)
Sweet!!  Kick his butt at Backgammon Monique  Joey
Right On TJ, Looks very cosey.  Are you's having any luck with the huntin? Birds, Rabbits.
bbbbbrrrrrrr, but pretty.  Gotta love that winter smell too.  Enjoy
Don't all y'all laugh at the same time now but that second pic reminds me of Dr. Shivago. Now I'll have Lara's Theme in my head all afternoon.....  Great picture essay.
If you got to break ice to get a drink or bathe it`s time to head south! Great pictures, but green beats white!
BOSS once again you remind us that you do live the good life have a great winter up there.
Perfect place to Hibernate!!!!!!!!!!!! Looks cozy for sure.
Looks like a great weekend get away. Thanks again for the pics and report from the camp.  Mike
Dr. Zhivago?  I was thinking Dr. Strangelove.
funny  I was thinking  Dr. Kevorkian
